title: Dreamwalkers
description: An omnigenre about a teen prodigy who's grown tiresome of his everyday controlled life and finds refuge in escaping to a dream world full of perfection. Ry Davies III is the son of an eccentric mayor who's paranoia has led him to build his own landlocked city for his family to live in. When Ry finally gets a chance to escape his father's utopia, he meets a group of friends that will forever shape both of the worlds he lives in. Action, adventure, mystery, comedy, suspense and romance are all packed into 200 pages of imperfect perfection.
author: Keith JK
